website_summaries.verdict: Intricatly engineered regulating system controls air to preserve the integrity and taste of beer.
pros: With careful consideration of the instructions, professional-grade beer is achievable
Weighs under five pounds but produces big-time results
Allows for great carbonation with its variable pressure regulation cap
cons: Not easy to set up on the fly but does come with thorough instructions

customer_reviews.title: In love, I do not go back to drink a ...
customer_reviews.text: In love, I do not go back to drink a canned beer or bottle. Incredible flavor, well carbonated 3 1/2 psi for me is the ideal point, a co2 cartridge yields at least 5 or 6 keg
customer_reviews.author: Roger Rincon

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I will buy again. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I use it almost everyday. Since 1/2018 and had no problems or leak. Don’t forget to lube the o-ring each time and it last a long time with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Toddsgoods

customer_reviews.title: Works well good value
customer_reviews.text: Works great I get 2 fills per 16g cartridge. Beer stays longer in fridge. Drawbacks are the faucet does drip a bit after closing so put it on a paper towel. Also a bit of an awkward size with it all set up. If you have a beer fridge no issue but in a home fridge could get knocked around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mac

customer_reviews.title: Keep fresh local beer on tap!...What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and can keep beer fresh for weeks at a time. No more need to chug the growler down within a day or two. Good customer service, even when user error is involved. Note: When the instructions say to turn the regulator (all the way) OFF before installing a new cartridge...They mean it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlyn

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Poured all foam at all pressures not worth the money will never buy again wasted lots of good beer
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler
customer_reviews.text: Love this pressurized growler. Great price and easy to set up. Holds pressure for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Unkel

customer_reviews.title: Updated review.  Customer service was wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We are having trouble with the cartridges working. We screw the cartridge in and a lot of gas escapes, it appears okay as we can set the pressure. But when we pour a glass we get zero pressure so we just need to find out how to put the cartridge in correctly. Updated customer service was wonderful helped us with our issues and item is working properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good kit
customer_reviews.text: this is very good. At the stainless steel is thick and good quality. It comes with everything for very good beer. the regulator is pretty accurate, from what i can tell. It holds pressure really well. It holds around 5 beers and you can get extra growlers. Comes with seals for all the fittings. I added a little teflon tape over the regulator copper fitting threads.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Starnotip

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fun. The faucet drips a few extra drops after you close it, so I replaced it with a Perlick. Now all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wont pour
customer_reviews.text: Product showed upand didnt work. The beer trickled out at first and now wont even trickle out. I have the hose and the recommended C02 cartridge in the system but still no beer will flow out like seen in videos.
customer_reviews.author: liam

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: One must do the math 64oz is half gallon 128oz is a gal
customer_reviews.author: Randy j. parrott

customer_reviews.title: A +
customer_reviews.text: Quality item for sure I would recommend the purchase to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: mickey1960

customer_reviews.title: Not legal to fill - without adding labels
customer_reviews.text: Not legal to fill at a store in the State of Maryland - no government required markings on the container. UPDATE: This was a gift - the seller contacted the buyer to resolve this issue - not me (a bit awkward). The issue was addressed by a partial refund of 2/3 the cost to buy the Federally required labels:  I purchased the labels and was finally able to fill the unit. It works as advertised but does leave a puddle in the refrigerator, recommend storing it on an absorbent towel.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Lower the pressure.
customer_reviews.text: Tone the pressure all the way down. The typical 10-20 may be too high. I have it on like 2-3 and that probably because of the size of the keg. Once you figure that out it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this gift for Xmas. I use it every time I go to the local brewery to get beer to go. Everyone always ask me where I got it and comment how cool it is. Nothing better than keeping my beer fresh and cold in this system.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great except i can't use it.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice and pretty but I was short an adapter to connect the Co2 gas regulator to the tap so I can't use it until I find the right threaded adapter.
customer_reviews.author: zeke

customer_reviews.title: Incredible performance and value!!
customer_reviews.text: This little device is amazing! How have I survived so long without it!! I live in an area famous for its micro breweries! This is what I’ve been missing! It works great! Highly recommend! Now I need another mini keg!
customer_reviews.author: Fergdaddy

product_meta.title: BACOENG 64 Ounce Pressurized Keg Growler, Kegerator for Home Brew Beer with Updated CO2 Regulator
feature_bullets: NEVER GO FLAT AGAIN: While traditional growlers will go flat after only a single pour, this mini keg will keep your beer fresh for up to 2 months by keeping the contents vacuum-pressured. You will never have to worry about the quality of your drink again!

DETACHABLE REGULATOR & SPOUT: The design of growler allows you to detach both the regulator, spout and faucet while keeping keg contents under pressure for storage. Our upgraded regulator can save 35% of Co2 compared to standard model. It is more precise than all other mini regulators and ensures that you can monitor the PSI and adjust the pressure from the regulator gauge.

COMPACT & LIGHTWEIGHT: Capable of holding up to 128oz, the barrel is light enough to carry around but will still satisfy any beer-lover with its large capacity. This keg's size makes it incredibly easy to transport, especially to outdoor and summer events.

CERTIFIED FOOD-GRADE STAINLESS STEEL: Every single part of the faucet distributor kit is made of food-grade 304 type stainless steel to maintain a clean and bacteria-free environment for your beer. This material also provides a robust, long-lasting build.
JUST ADD A CO2 CARTRIDGE: The only thing you need to get your barrel up and running is a CO2 cartridge.Threaded CO2 Cartridge System (3/8" CO2 Cartridge) - CO2 CARTRIDGE NOT INCLUDED!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
